Dialogue: Meat of the past... help me!
For my kingdom, spirits of old!
My army... rise and crush them!
Freeze in the presence of your King!
Feel the weight of the crown!
The Lord of Terror has returned!
Even death cannot save you from me.
GRRR...! The ground burns with my fury!
Tremble before the true power of Hell!
I shall return... as long as there is fear...
Death is only the beginning... and stone is its monument.
I sense a living soul... how rare.
Look into my eyes... and despair!
GRRR...! Taste the chill of the grave!
Rise, my champion! Enforce my will!
Death is not the end... it is the beginning of your torment!
The cold of the grave awaits!
